name: VolBoostZ
description: This effect provides a clean boost without changing frequency characteristics.

Parameters.name: VPosi
Parameters.description: Sets the starting position value. After the pedal is moved, the actual position value is used.

Parameters.name: HPosi
Parameters.description: Sets the starting position value. After the pedal is moved, the actual position value is used.

Parameters.name: Curve
Parameters.description: Selects the type of curve used for vertical adjustments.

Parameters.name: LEFT
Parameters.description: Sets the volume when pushed all the way left.

Parameters.name: CNTR
Parameters.description: Sets the volume when in the center position.

Parameters.name: RIGHT
Parameters.description: Sets the volume when pushed all the way right.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: Filter-Z
description: The cut-off frequency and resonance of this filter effect can be controlled using the pedal.

Parameters.name: Freq
Parameters.description: Sets the cut-off frequency.

Parameters.name: Reso
Parameters.description: Sets the resonance of the filter.

Parameters.name: Bal
Parameters.description: Sets the balance between source and effect sounds.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: Tremolo-Z
description: The depth and rate of this tremolo effect can be controlled using the pedal.

Parameters.name: Depth
Parameters.description: Sets the modulation depth.

Parameters.name: Rate
Parameters.description: Sets the modulation speed.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

Parameters.name: Wave
Parameters.description: Sets the waveform used for modulation.

Parameters.name: PSync
Parameters.description: When ON, the rate value adjusted by pedal horizontal operation will be synchronized to tempo.

name: Flanger-Z
description: The mix and rate of this flanger effect can be controlled using the pedal.

Parameters.name: Mix
Parameters.description: Sets the volume of the effect compared to the source sound.

Parameters.name: Rate
Parameters.description: Sets the modulation speed.

Parameters.name: Depth
Parameters.description: Sets the modulation depth.

Parameters.name: PreD
Parameters.description: Sets the pre-delay time of the effect sound.

Parameters.name: PSync
Parameters.description: When ON, the rate value adjusted by pedal horizontal operation is synchronized to tempo.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: Echo-Z
description: The time and feedback of this echo effect can be controlled using the pedal.

Parameters.name: Time
Parameters.description: Sets the delay time.

Parameters.name: F.B 0-100
Parameters.description: Sets the feedback amount.

Parameters.name: Mix
Parameters.description: Sets the volume of the effect compared to the source sound.

Parameters.name: HiDMP
Parameters.description: Sets the attenuation of the high frequencies in the delay sound.

Parameters.name: Sync
Parameters.description: When ON, the time value adjusted by pedal vertical operation will be synchronized to tempo.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: Rotary-Z
description: The rotation speed and width of this rotary speaker simulation can be controlled using the pedal.

Parameters.name: Speed
Parameters.description: Sets the rotation speed.

Parameters.name: Width
Parameters.description: Sets the width of the high frequencies.

Parameters.name: Bal
Parameters.description: Sets the balance between the horn (high frequencies) and drum (low frequencies).

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

Parameters.name: Drive
Parameters.description: Sets the amount of amplification of the preamp.

name: TalkPDL-Z
description: This effect can make a guitar sound like a human voice.

Parameters.name: VPosi
Parameters.description: Sets the starting position value. After the pedal is moved, the actual position value is used.

Parameters.name: HPosi
Parameters.description: Sets the starting position value. After the pedal is moved, the actual position value is used.

Parameters.name: Voice
Parameters.description: Sets the voice quality.

Parameters.name: Mode
Parameters.description: Sets how vowel sounds change.

Parameters.name: Tone
Parameters.description: Sets the tone.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: TRM&PHSR
description: This effect allows the pedal to be used for tremolo when shifted left and phaser when shifted right.

Parameters.name: Depth
Parameters.description: Sets the depth of the effect.

Parameters.name: TrmRt
Parameters.description: Sets the rate of the tremolo.

Parameters.name: PhaRt
Parameters.description: Sets the rate of the phaser.

Parameters.name: Wave
Parameters.description: Selects the waveform used for tremolo modulation.

Parameters.name: Color
Parameters.description: Sets the type of phaser color.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: CHO&REV
description: This effect allows the pedal to be used for chorus when shifted left and reverb when shifted right.

Parameters.name: Depth
Parameters.description: Sets the depth of the effect.

Parameters.name: ChoRt
Parameters.description: Sets the rate of the chorus.

Parameters.name: Decay
Parameters.description: Sets the length of the decay.

Parameters.name: RevMx
Parameters.description: Sets the reverb mix.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: FLNG&DLY
description: This effect allows the pedal to be used for flanging when shifted left and delay when shifted right.

Parameters.name: Depth
Parameters.description: Sets the depth of the effect.

Parameters.name: FlgRt
Parameters.description: Sets the rate of the flanger.

Parameters.name: DlyTm
Parameters.description: Sets the delay time of the delay.

Parameters.name: FlgDp
Parameters.description: Sets the depth of the flanger.

Parameters.name: DlyFB
Parameters.description: Sets the feedback of the delay.

Parameters.name: DlyMx
Parameters.description: Sets the delay mix.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: OctPitch
description: This effect, which is designed for playing single notes, allows the pedal to be used to change the pitch by up to -1 octave when shifted left and up to +1 octave when shifted right.

Parameters.name: Pitch
Parameters.description: Sets the amount of pitch shift.

Parameters.name: Tone
Parameters.description: Sets the tone.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: W-Shift
description: This effect, which is designed for playing single notes, allows the pedal to control pitch and vibrato.

Parameters.name: Pitch
Parameters.description: Sets the amount of pitch shift.

Parameters.name: VIBRT
Parameters.description: Sets the amount of vibrato applied.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

Parameters.name: Rate
Parameters.description: Sets the vibrato speed.

Parameters.name: Depth
Parameters.description: Sets the vibrato depth.

Parameters.name: Tone
Parameters.description: Sets the tone.

name: HotSpice
description: This effect simulates a sitar tone.

Parameters.name: Sitar
Parameters.description: Sets the balance between the sitar sound and the original sound.

Parameters.name: PitMx
Parameters.description: Sets the volume of doubling one octave up.

Parameters.name: Input
Parameters.description: Selects the source of the input signal used for the sitar effect.

Parameters.name: Reso
Parameters.description: Sets the strength of the resonance motion.

Parameters.name: Buzz
Parameters.description: Sets the buzzing tone.

Parameters.name: Sense
Parameters.description: Sets the sensitivity of the effect.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: ChaosDLY
description: This chaos effect uses filter and echo.

Parameters.name: Chaos
Parameters.description: Sets the depth of the filter and echo.

Parameters.name: Time
Parameters.description: Sets the echo time.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

Parameters.name: FltOs
Parameters.description: Sets the minimum frequency of the filter.

name: Starship
description: This effect makes a sound like a flying spaceship.

Parameters.name: Accel
Parameters.description: Sets the “acceleration” of the sound by changing the sample rate.

Parameters.name: Power
Parameters.description: Sets the “power” by changing the balance of the sound.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

Parameters.name: Reso
Parameters.description: Sets the strength of the resonance of the effect.

Parameters.name: VLCTY
Parameters.description: Sets the speed of the sound change.

name: RNDM Talk
description: This talking effect changes vowel sounds at random.

Parameters.name: Speed x2-
Parameters.description: Sets the speed of vowel sound change.

Parameters.name: Voice
Parameters.description: Sets the quality of the voice.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: FuzzyBack
description: This fuzz effect feeds back overtones when single notes are played.  The feedback sound is sustained when the Z-Pedal is shifted all the way to the right.

Parameters.name: Gain
Parameters.description: Sets the gain.

Parameters.name: HRMNX
Parameters.description: Sets the amount of feedback of the overtones.
Parameters.name: Level

Parameters.description: Sets the output level.
Parameters.name: Depth
Parameters.description: Sets the depth of the gain when the pedal is pressed.

name: Granular
description: This effect freely granulizes the sound that is sampled regularly.

Parameters.name: Size
Parameters.description: Sets the fineness of the grains.

Parameters.name: Flt
Parameters.description: Sets the amount of filter applied.

Parameters.name: Rate
Parameters.description: Sets the sampling frequency. When set to Hold, the sound is sampled when picking occurs.

Parameters.name: FltOs
Parameters.description: Sets the minimum frequency of the filter.

Parameters.name: FltRs
Parameters.description: Sets the strength of the filter resonance.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: SpaceWorm
description: This ring modulator creates a spacey sound.

Parameters.name: Freq
Parameters.description: Sets the depth of the ring modulator.

Parameters.name: Speed
Parameters.description: Sets the speed of the step waveform.

Parameters.name: Depth
Parameters.description: Sets the frequency of the ring modulation.

Parameters.name: Step
Parameters.description: Sets the number of steps in the step waveform.

Parameters.name: Level
Parameters.description: Sets the output level.

name: Custom
description: Use this to control the parameters of other effects using the Z-Pedal.

Parameters.name: ZP-V : DEST
Parameters.description: Sets the parameter controlled by vertical movement of the Z-Pedal.

Parameters.name: ZP-V : min
Parameters.description: Sets the value when the pedal is all the way up.

Parameters.name: ZP-V : max
Parameters.description: Sets the value when the pedal is all the way down.

Parameters.name: ZP-L : DEST
Parameters.description: Sets the parameter controlled by left movement of the Z-Pedal.

Parameters.name: ZP-L: Left
Parameters.description: Sets the value when the pedal is all the way left.

Parameters.name: ZP-L : Center
Parameters.description: Sets the value when the pedal is in the center position.

Parameters.name: ZP-R : DEST
Parameters.description: Sets the parameter controlled by right movement of the Z-Pedal.

Parameters.name: ZP-R : Center
Parameters.description: Sets the value when the pedal is in the center position.

Parameters.name: ZP-R : Right
Parameters.description: Sets the value when the pedal is all the way right.
